basicInfo.name: Li
basicInfo.flavor: When Li returned home, the Auric Nation was left in ruins by the demons. Furious, Li abandoned all his teachings, vowing to get revenge.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 12% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 14% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 1.name: Iron Physique
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Turns: Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Reduces Cooldown: To 68s.

Skill 2.name: Annihilating Strike
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - 11% HP Alteration
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Physical Attack plus 29% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: HP Alteration to 11%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Reduces Cooldown: To 68s.

Passive.name: Sign of Revenge
Passive.desc:
Self
 - 29% chance to do a Counterattack. [Always Active]
 - Heals HP equal to 29% of the caster's Max HP when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Single Enemy When Counterattacking
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 12% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Chance: Counterattack chance becomes 38%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Respected monks, Evan, veggie dumplings, veggie bibimbap, order, peace, birds
profile.story: When Li returned home, the Auric Nation was left in ruins by the demons. Furious, Li abandoned all his teachings, vowing to get revenge.

basicInfo.name: Li
basicInfo.flavor: Li was one of the elite Auric Nation monks due to his strong will, effort, and natural talent. He set out on an adventure to hone his skills.

 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

 - Deals damage equal to 110% of Physical Attack plus 26% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Physical Attack.

Self
 - 26% chance to do a Counterattack. [Always Active]
 - Heals HP equal to 26% of the caster's Max HP when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Single Enemy When Counterattacking

 - 35% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]

basicInfo.name: Li
basicInfo.flavor: Hidden away, the monks of the Auric Nation undergo rigorous training under the tutelage of several elders and practice with unparalleled discipline.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 10% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).

Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Annihilating Strike
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - 58% HP Alteration
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack plus 24% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 100% of Physical Attack.

Self

 - 30% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
